item.title: New Webclient ISsue
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok it seems its not downloading the cache but instead its making null cache files and then closing the web browser out cause it cant load the client i suggest using a compressed file and then have a extractor extract the cache into the specified area

EDIT: I looked at your directory and found you did try that way so you’ll have to figure a way to get cache downloaded a different way

u have to change the sprites in class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 so that they link to an external site like an image host, because it cant grab images from inside the .jar file.
